name: Don't Drop the Ornaments
description:
Prototype for Weekly Game Jam 18. Theme: Don't Drop It. Use the jet powered RC basket to place ornaments on the tree. Arrows or WASD to control it. Space will reset.

Music by Maja Salamon (AQUAGON) - https://soundcloud.com/maja-salamon

Sound Design by Marshall Miller (Asaedry) - http://www.marshallmillermusic.com/

Programming and Development Art by Dennis McWilliams
